titleStmt.title: SII 13.99: original edition by G.V. Srinivasa Rao
No. 99. (A.R. No. 117 of 1926.) TIRUVIḶAKKUḌI, MAYAVARAM TALUK, TANJORE DISTRICT. ON THE NORTH WALL OF THE CENTRAL SHRINE, MAṆAVĀḶĒŚVARA TEMPLE.

summary.p: This records an endowment of land to provide for the daily supply of six nāḻi of rice for offering in the temple of Naḍuvil-Śrīkōyil at Muruguvēḷ-maṅgalam, a brahmadēya in Kuṟukkai-nāḍu, by Pāradāyaṉ Vēṅgaḍavaṉ Chandirādittaṉ of the village, and its exemption from taxes by the sabhā.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . kovirājakesaripanmaṟkku yāṇṭu
4Āvatu vaṭakaraik kuṟukkaināṭṭu brahmadeyam murukuveḷmaṅkalattu pāratāyan veṅkaṭavan cantirātitta
neṉ Ivūr naṭuvilśrīkoyilil devarkkut tiruvamutukku nivantam ceytu Aṭṭikkuṭutta nila māvatu Enṉuṭaiya
nilam melaipputukiṇaṟṟu meṟkaṭaiya teṟku vaṭakkāka Ūrāṭu kolālaḷantu kuṭukka kkiṇaṟṟukku nikkun tulaikkuṅ kālu
kkum Urittāka cantirātittaval tiruvamirtukku ceytu kuṭutta nilam kāṟceykku Ellai kiḻpāṟkellai pāratāyan veṅkaṭavaṉ
cantirātitta nilattukku meṟkum teṉpā y punakan teṟṟikku ni yappona Uḷ ciṅ kālukku vaṭakkum
melpāṟkellai punakan teṟṟi m puḻavāṟṟukke viḻunta vāykkālukkuk kiḻakkum vaṭapāṟkellai sabhaip
potuvāna Appankuḻikku teṟkum Ivicaitta nālellaiyilu makappaṭṭa nilaṅ kāṟ ceyilum Idevarkku nicati Aṟuṉāḻi A
rici tiruvamirtukkāka nivantam ceytu Aṭṭikkuṭutteṉ naṭuvilśrīkoyil devarkku pāratāyaṉ veṅkaṭavan cantirāti
ttaneṉ Inilam Iṟai tavirntu Iṟai Iḻiccik kuṭuttom murukuveḷmaṅkalattu sabhaiyom paṇiyāl ma
dhyasthan nayamāna nakkaṉṉāna Alaṅkārapriyanen Ivai yen neḻuttu vayiṣṇavarakṣai .
Digital edition of SII 13.99 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
